string.text: The SP-5 is a subsonic sniper round with a bimetallic casing. The round contains a steel core with a gap behind it that is filled with lead. Requires a silencer for stealth firing. Used by special services of Warsaw Pact countries.

The SP-6 is a subsonic assault rifle round with a jacketed soft point bullet with a hard steel core that protrudes from the casing. Requires a silencer for stealth firing. Used by special services of Warsaw Pact countries. Effective against body armor.

This 9x19 caliber jacketed hollow point bullet with an expanding hollow provides high stopping power and low ricochet propensity. Used by police and for self-defense. Ineffective against body armor due to its low penetration potential.

This basic 9x19 caliber round with a jacketed bullet has good characteristics while being simple to produce. The round is popular due to the fact that international conventions prohibit the use of expanding ammunition in combat. Ineffective against body armor.

This round contains a bullet with enhanced stopping power, while its European +P+ designation indicates "overpressure ammunition" with a 30% increase in muzzle velocity. Ineffective against body armor.

This basic 9x19 caliber round with a jacketed bullet has good characteristics while being simple to produce. The round is popular due to the fact that international conventions prohibit the use of expanding ammunition in combat. Ineffective against body armor.
Cheap 7.62 caliber machine gun round. Its design makes it unsuitable for sniper rifles, so it is used only with the RP-74 machine gun.
A 7.62 caliber sniper round with a steel penetrator specially designed for the SVD. Unlike the machine gun round, the 7H1 provides tight groupings and excellent penetration characteristics.

A standard issue NATO 5.56x45 caliber round specially designed for accurate automatic fire. Provides good ballistic characteristics, having been designed on the basis of a hunting round. Widely known under its SS109 index.
A common NATO military 5.56x45 caliber armor piercing round, known under its SS190/M855 index, widely used by Western security agencies and special services. Effective against body armor.

Military 5.45x39 7H10 caliber improved piercing round for automatic rifles of Warsaw Pact countries. Provides better accuracy than the 7.62 caliber round thanks to reduced recoil and a 100 meter increase in range.
Military 5.45x39 7H22 caliber armor-piercing round for automatic rifles of Warsaw Pact countries. The bullet contains a hard-alloy armor piercing penetrator. Effective against body armor.
This heavy 12 caliber slug round is normally used for hunting big game, but is also good for other purposes. Instead of piercing, this hefty slug simply crushes through armor.
Standard 12-caliber round filled with 6 mm shot. Highly lethal at close range. Only suitable for use with smoothbore weapons.

This unusual .45 ACP caliber round is comprised of a jacketed soft point bullet with an expanding hollow and a steel core. It is a combination of jacketed expanding soft point and armor piercing bullets, benefiting, from the advantages of both and, suffering from their downsides.

The .45 caliber full metal jacket round has enjoyed popularity for more than a hundred years thanks to its heavy bullet and a relatively small propelling charge. As a result, the bullet in this round is relatively slow but highly accurate and provides considerable stopping power.

Fragmentation warhead for anti-personnel warfare used with the RPG-7u grenade launcher. The main purpose of the warhead is to kill enemies in cover outside the range of hand grenades using the RPG-7u launcher.
40 mm grenade for the M203 underbarrel grenade launcher. This round has a 5 meter kill zone. Also suitable for use in the FT-200M integrated grenade launcher.

Regular fragmentation grenade for the GP-25 Koster underbarrel grenade launcher. This round has a 5 meter kill zone. The VOG-25 grenade is also used in the Tunder S14 complex and Bulldog 6 revolver-type grenade launcher.
Batteries which use as an energy source encapsulated piece of the artifact "Flash". Manufactured in a factory using high-tech equipment.

Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 240
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 30 r/m
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 2500 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Speed of pulse = 100000 m/s
%c[default]Batteries with reduced capacity, which use as an energy source encapsulated fragment of the artifact "Flash". The reduced capacity is conditioned by primitive manufacturing of the batteries and the lack of special equipment.
A common Soviet-made 5.0x fixed zoom optical scope with a range scale. Attached to weapons by means of a dovetail mount, which is standard in Warsaw Pact countries.

A 5.0x fixed zoom optical scope with a built-in heat visor used to identify heat sources typical of the human body. Designed for use by special forces. Attached to weapons by means of a dovetail mount.
An image intensifier night vision 5.0x fixed zoom scope for combat in darkness. Attached to weapons by means of a dovetail mount.
An adjustable long-range 1.6-4x zoom scope that can use automatic adjustment to provide greater fire effectiveness. Attached to weapons by means of the NATO-standard Picatinny rail.
A 4x fixed zoom scope produced primarily in Western countries. Attached to weapons by means of the NATO-standard Picatinny rail. Often used for accurate fire from small arms at medium to long range.
An optical SUSAT 1.6x higher contrast scope for combat in reduced lighting conditions. Attaches to weapons by means of the NATO-standard Picatinny rail.
A 4.0x fixed zoom scope with a night vision device for long range combat in darkness. Attaches to weapons by means of the NATO-standard Picatinny rail.
An optical SUSAT 1.6x scope for combat at short to medium range. Attaches to weapons by means of the NATO-standard Picatinny rail.
A 2.7x optical scope for urban combat at medium range. Attaches to weapons by means of a dovetail mount.

An effective silencer which can be modified on the go as required. The body of the silencer around the barrel contains a roll of fine brass mesh, while the front comprises a set of metal diaphragms with holes for the bullet to pass through. The set includes adaptors and sealants for most weapons. Normally used to thin out enemy ranks without drawing attention.

A single shot, front loaded, rifled underbarrel grenade launcher for assault rifles made in Warsaw Pact countries. The firing mechanism is self-cocking, with a manual safety catch and automatic shot prevention if incorrectly installed onto a rifle. Uses VOG-25 grenades.

A modified M203 grenade launcher that has been shortened by three inches, attached to weapons by means of a Picatinny Rail. Thanks to a changed mount, this grenade launcher is widely used around the world.
An optical 5.0x SUSAT scope with built in heat visor designed to detect heat sources emanating from mammalian bodies. Attaches to weapons by means of the NATO-standard Picatinny rail.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Blast radius = 14 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Splinters spread = 22 metres
%c[default]A defensive hand grenade, with fragments capable of piercing medium level body armor. The grenade has a 7 meter kill radius. Stalkers get F1 grenades from trading with the military, who write them off as having been used for fighting mutants.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Blast radius = 8 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Splinters spread = 17 meters
%c[default]An offensive hand grenade with a small kill zone of 5 meters. Often used by stalkers to "smoke out" mutants due to its relatively low cost.

%c[default]Characteristics:\n%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Time of the screen formation = 30 seconds\n%c[default]A hand smoke grenade. Used to put up smoke screens. Once the grenade is thrown it takes 10 seconds for the smoke screen to expand.

%c[default]Characteristics:\n%c[255,238,153,26]* %c[default]Effect time = 120 seconds\n%c[default]It is designed to illuminate dark areas, Extremely useful at night and for foray's into underground areas.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 80
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 400 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 45 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 190 m/s
%c[default]A sawed-off hunting shotgun with two side-by-side barrels, making it lighter and more compact than a full shotgun. One of the most popular weapons among bandits due to its combination of ease of concealment and extreme effectiveness in close combat. 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 63, with silencer = 60
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 585 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 200 meters, with silencer 180
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 600 m/s, with silencer 500
%c[default]This assault rifle combined with a grenade launcher, which is similar to the AKM series, was specially developed for rapid response units. The main differences are its 9x39 caliber ammunition, bullpup layout and extensive configuration options. This weapon is highly valued by military stalkers due to its ability to kill enemies wearing body armor behind improvised cover at a distance during urban combat, as well as its excellent stopping power. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 45, with silencer = 43
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 162 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 150 meters, with silencer 130
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 160 m/s, with silencer 120
%c[default]A modified model of a pistol from the first half of the 20th century, which is as reliable, powerful and accurate as the original. Pistols of this series deserve their reputation as one of the best handguns of the 20th century and are in great demand in the Zone.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 29, with silencer = 27
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 620 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 60 meters, with silencer 80
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 270 m/s, with silencer 200
%c[default]This submachine gun has gained popularity around the world thanks to its reliability, ease of use and accuracy. Over the last few decades it was in service with special armed forces and police units worldwide. Not surprisingly, having flooded the global black markets, it eventually made its way to the Zone.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 115
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 100 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 300 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 32 m/s
%c[default]This revolver-type grenade launcher uses six rifled front-loading barrels, identical to underbarrel launcher attachments. The drum is also front-loading. Widely used for rapid suppression of enemy firing positions and, when in the open, attacking defended fixed targets or fighting particularly tough monsters.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 88
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 525 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 100 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 600 m/s
%c[default]This belt-fed machine gun is a portable modification with a complex two-stage feeding system. Despite its weight and low precision, it has found admirers in the Zone. Used primarily to fight off outnumbering enemy forces during faction conflicts and clear out mutant lairs.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 100
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 60 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 1200 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 1000 m/s
%c[default]An army sniper rifle that has been on the market for more than fifty years and has earned its reputation for exceptional reliability and ease of use. It is normally used by the army to improve the effective range of its units, but stalkers respect this weapon for its armor-piercing properties, which allow it to penetrate mutant hide and army body armor. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 62
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 500 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 40 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 240 m/s
%c[default]This extremely common over-and-under hunting shotgun can offer better protection against mutants than a pistol, thanks to its accuracy and stopping power. Used mostly by rookies on the outskirts of the Zone. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 60, with silencer = 59
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 224 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 150 meters, with silencer 145
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 195 m/s, with silencer 130
%c[default]Impeccable reliability and durability combined with excellent accuracy are the main noteworthy features of this weapon. Its minor drawbacks include its considerable size, relatively high center of gravity and massive bolt, which make it difficult to conceal but do not outweigh the weapon's positive features. The weapon is especially popular with the Zone's veterans.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 55
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 580 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 250 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 354 m/s
%c[default]A special military sniper rifle purpose-built for silent, flashless sniping during special operations where early detection of the shooter may be critical. It provides high armor-piercing capability and stopping power, as well as being equipped with an integrated sniper and optical scope. Highly rated by many stalkers despite its small magazine. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 70
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 94 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 60 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 230 m/s
%c[default]A Western smoothbore shotgun that is extremely popular around the world thanks to its amazing reliability and faster reloading speed. Particularly valued for its functionality by the Zone's hunters. All of its parts are coated with an anticorrosion compound. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 54, with silencer = 53
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 590 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 200 meters, with silencer 190
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 550 m/s, with silencer 400
%c[default]A relatively new assault rifle that has quickly found admirers around the world, despite lacking a "trendy" design. Weapons of this series are one of the best in their class, renowned for their reliability, accuracy and ease of use. Despite being relatively difficult to obtain in the Zone, this assault rifle is often ordered by experienced stalkers at considerable expense.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 41, with silencer = 40
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 570 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 200 meters, with silencer 170
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 550 m/s, with silencer 325
%c[default]A modern assault rifle developed as a replacement for the aging AKM 74/2. The main difference is its high speed 2-round burst firing mode, which allows two bullets to be fired at exactly the same spot on a target up to 100 meters away. This significantly increases the likelihood of hitting the target in comparison to the 1 round firing mode, which considerably improves kill potential, stopping power and armor piercing capability.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 42, with silencer = 41
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 700 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 250 meters, with silencer 210
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 550 m/s, with silencer 400
%c[default]This weapon, designed in 1974, signaled the adoption of small caliber and low impulse rounds by Warsaw Pact countries. A descendant of the most popular assault rifle in the world, it has an even bigger muzzle brake, resulting in a reduction of what was already manageable recoil. This facilitates better accuracy and groupings, especially when fired in fast single shots or bursts. As before, the rifle is very simple and reliable.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 29, with silencer = 28
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 575 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 100 meters, with silencer 95
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 410 m/s, with silencer 300
%c[default]Despite being similar to submachine guns in size, weight and tactical purpose, this weapon is classified as an assault rifle due to the fact that its internal mechanism is identical to that of the AKM 74/2. The weapon is notable for its mobility in close quarters and high armor-penetration capacity, while its drawbacks are its short effective range, despite the relatively long bullet range, a tendency to overheat and high ricochet propensity.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 46, With silencer = 43
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 157 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 100 meters, with silencer 100
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 150 m/s, with silencer 100
%c[default]An improved version of a classic automatic pistol, which passed all the major armed conflicts of the 20th century with flying colors and entered the new millennium with confidence. Produced by dozens if not hundreds of arms manufacturers around the world in both standard and modified configurations. The weaponТs only drawback, its mediocre magazine capacity, is largely compensated by the hard-hitting ammo it uses.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 65
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 145 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 150 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 275 m/s
%c[default]The ultimate hand cannon - bulky, heavy and highly lethal. Developed as a specialized weapon for hunting medium-sized and large game, as well as for shooting competitions involving firing at steel body targets at distances over 50 meters. Its limited use in the Zone can be attributed to its price, size and weight, which are all double those of other pistols. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 55, with silencer = 51
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 670 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 230 meters, with silencer 200
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 700 m/s, with silenser 600
%c[default]This futuristic-looking weapon with a bullpup layout is actually a mass produced modular system, comprising a rifle & grenade complex with a computerized fire control system and a 40-mm grenade launcher. Despite its bulky appearance, the weapon is highly ergonomic, easy to use and benefits from good technical characteristics.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 28, with silencer = 27
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 183 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 50 meters, with silencer 45
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 175 m/s, with silencer 123
%c[default]A Ukrainian-made pistol predominantly used by law enforcement organizations. Provides higher accuracy, better ergonomics and has a larger magazine than the PMm. These pistols make it into the Zone in large numbers thanks to the sale of defective weapons, which suffer from technical miscalculations in early design models. Despite this, the pistol is in demand among stalkers thanks to its good combat characteristics.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 50, with silencer = 49
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 630 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 200 meters, with silencer 150
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 570 m/s, with silencer 490
%c[default]A new addition to the Western-made assault rifle family, which differs significantly from previous models in the series built on an automatic foundation with a semi-open bolt assembly, this weapon is more like American automatic gas-operated assault rifles with a short-stroke gas piston system. These changes ensure that the rifle is a first-rate example of a modern weapon - lightweight, reliable and ergonomic.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 42, with silencer = 40
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 610 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 300 meters, with silencer 250
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 500 m/s, with silencer 400
%c[default]This rifleТs considerable number of drawbacks caused most of these weapons to be modernized, with the retired stock making its way to the Zone via the black market. The rifle's main advantages are its built-in 4x scope, high single-shot accuracy and reliable upgrade technology. When the weapon is fired in bursts, its accuracy decreases significantly and the rifle's basic internal mechanisms become somewhat unreliable.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 41, with silencer = 40
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 685 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 200 meters, with silencer 190
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 600 m/s, with silencer 500
%c[default]A new step in the development of this famous weapon family. The changes were made to the upper half of the steel construction comprising the barrel, gas tube and bolt assembly, reducing the weaponТs weight, improving ergonomics and its gas system. The weapon is highly accurate, although its propensity to catch dirt makes it a poor choice for the ZoneТs difficult conditions.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 42
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 162 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 50
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 435 m/s
%c[default]This pistol was developed in the second half of the 20th century on the basis of the PMm for use by special forces and scouting units. The front of the pistolТs barrel is covered with an integrated silencer, while the bolt mechanism is short, which prevents a back-moving spring from being located inside it, and it is therefore situated in the weaponТs handle. Morally obsolete, the weapon is still effective in the right hands.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 21, with silencer = 20
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 172 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 50 meters, with silencer 40
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 145 m/s, with silencer 105
%c[default]This Soviet legacy is the most common pistol in the Zone and is one of the best compact self-defense handguns available. It is small, highly reliable, easy to use and maintain in working order. It also suffers from several drawbacks, including its short range, low firing accuracy and poor stopping power, while also losing out to modern pistols in its class in terms of weight and magazine size.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 62
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 155 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 90 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 235 m/s
%c[default]A smoothbore combat revolver-type shotgun intended to provide extreme firepower for militarized units. The weapon benefits from a large magazine and a high effective rate of fire, but its bulkiness and considerable weight, combined with a long reload time, are the price to be paid for these advantages. Rare in the Zone and is used primarily to clear closed spaces of mutants. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 300
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 6 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 600 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 100 m/s
%c[default]This grenade launcher from the 1960s made its way into the Zone from army depots. The weapon is a smoothbore single-shot recoilless launch system with an open-rear tube. Comes with a PGO-7 x2.7 optical scope. Although its huge size and weight make it an unlikely choice for stalkers, given its huge destructive power and ease of use, it has found admirers in the Zone.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 60, with silencer = 59
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 176 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 150 meters, with silencer 140
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 185 m/s, with silencer 120
%c[default]The only remaining mass produced model of a globally renowned pistol, this weapon has earned a reputation for its excellent ergonomics and accuracy, and while its magazine is relatively small, it benefits from powerful ammo and a mechanism that functions like a Swiss watch. Not surprisingly, the gun is in continuous demand by experienced stalkers and mercenaries.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 81
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 115 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 80 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 220 m/s
%c[default]This special purpose smoothbore automatic shotgun was designed in the second half of the 20th century and comes with pump-action and self-cocking firing modes. Used as an all-purpose weapon by the police and assault troops. Notable for its reliability and tactical flexibility. Despite its large weight, complex mechanism and considerable cost it is in demand in the Zone due to its effectiveness against mutants. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 75
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 75 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 500 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 700 m/s
%c[default]A modernized version of the SVDm-2 sniper rifle in a compact bullpup design made on the order of rapid response forces. It allows faster precision fire and is considerably lighter, while its single shot firing accuracy at short and medium range is similar to that of its predecessor. These qualities have earned it the admiration of countless stalkers. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 60
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 580 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 200 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 290 m/s
%c[default]A modified version of the silent Vintar BC sniper rifle, this assault rifle was designed as a special forces weapon. The rifleТs primary purpose is effective fire against enemies employing modern personal protection equipment without disclosing the shooterТs location. One of the main features is the use of an integrated silencer and 9x39 mm caliber cartridges with heavy bullets. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 400
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 30 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 2000 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Speed of pulse = 15000 m/s
%c[default]A super-accurate hi-tech weapon known as item 62, this rifle was developed in secret laboratories located inside the Zone. The weapon operates by accelerating bullets to extremely high speeds using a system of electromagnets, which provides incredible stopping power with virtually no recoil. The weapon is powered by using encapsulated artifact fragments in the batteries.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 44, with silencer = 43
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 172 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 120 meters, with silencer 110
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 210 m/s, with silencer 120
%c[default]Pistols in this series enjoy the reputation of a relatively reliable, albeit somewhat cumbersome weapon, around the world. In service with armed forces and police across the ocean, as well as various military and law enforcement organizations worldwide. The pistol is equally popular with members of the underworld, thanks to its powerful round and magazine capacity. The models of the weapon which can be found in the Zone are usually outdated, probably from retired stock.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 36, with silencer = 35
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 225 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 80 meters, with silencer 60
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 225 m/s, with silencer 150
%c[default]An excellent Western pistol known for its reliability, high capacity magazine and good accuracy, as well as being among the most ergonomic handguns in its class. One of the most widely used pistols in the Zone, both among professionals and rookies who can afford it.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 50, with silencer = 49
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 176 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 150 meters, with silencer 140
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 185 m/s, with silencer 185
%c[default]A unique model of the SIP-t M200 handgun. Part of a small limited edition which was made for an unidentified special forces unit. The model benefits from an increased magazine capacity, a high durability steel barrel and an ultradurable polymer receiver.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 60, with silencer = 59
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 590 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 200 meters, with silencer 190
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 550 m/s, with silencer 550
%c[default]A Swiss-made SGI-5k assault rifle. Although it is hardly new, it is clear that the previous owner took good care of it: the weapon has been taken apart and put back together, with every component fine-tuned for optimum performance, increasing stopping power. The letter "S" has been carved into the stock, along with 16 small notches.

The SPSA-AUT self-cocking shotgun is made only in Duty workshops. This weapon is intended for fighting large groups of mutants. Its improved feeding mechanism ensures a high rate of fire and the magazine capacity has been increased to 10 rounds. Uses 12x70 caliber rounds. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 81
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 180 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 90 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 220 m/s
%c[default]An army shotgun designed specifically for assault units on the basis of the SPSA-14. Capable of automatic fire like its predecessor, but provides better recoil compensation thanks to a balanced shock free system. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 130
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 60 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 1000 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 900 m/s
%c[default]A hand-assembled version of the SVDm-2 sniper rifle. No different in appearance, it nonetheless provides an ideal combination of accuracy and stopping power. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 75
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 150 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 500 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 700 m/s
%c[default]This shortened sniper rifle with an increase rate of fire is the next step in the evolution of the SVUmk-2 sniper rifle. This weapon used to belong to Max, the legendary guardian of Freedom. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 440
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 30 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 2500 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Speed of pulse = 100000 m/s
%c[default]An unknown weapon, the firing mechanism of which has not been established. The weapon appears faulty - squeezing the trigger doesn't do anything.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 60, with silencer = 59
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 250 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 180 meters, with silencer 150
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 195 m/s, with silencer 195
%c[default]A compact, large caliber pistol with short bolt movement and lightweight bolt assembly. Used to belong to a mercenary called Wolfhound. Appears to be a modified UDP "Compact" pistol.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 62
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 375 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 320 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 520 m/s
%c[default]A weapon made for military units on the basis of the silent sniper rifle Vintar BC. The rifle has higher stopping power than its predecessor, at the expense of its rate of fire. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 90
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 105 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 60 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 190 m/s
%c[default]A tailor-made pump-action shotgun which used to belong to Trapper. The hunter's only requirement in respect of his weapon was that it needed to kill mutants in one shot. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 80
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 145 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 150
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 275 m/s
%c[default]A hand-made pistol based on the Black Kite design. The components are finely tuned to achieve incredible accuracy for a handgun of this type. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 73, with silencer = 71
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 655 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 250 meters, with silencer 220
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 600 m/s, with silencer 600
%c[default]An experimental version of an assault rifle and grenade launcher system, a Russian modification of the standard Tunder S14, this weapon was specially designed for units operating in the Zone. Notable for its increased magazine capacity. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 45, with silencer = 44
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 700 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 80 meters, with silencer 100
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 270 m/s, with silencer 270
%c[default]A submachine gun prototype based on the excellent Viper 5 model. Designed as a close combat weapon of the next generation, it benefits from a higher caliber, rate of fire and accuracy.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 88
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 525 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 100 meters
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 600 m/s
%c[default]This weapon was previously owned by Zulu. Its special features include an enlarged ammo box and a particularly reliable retracting mechanism design. The modifications meant an increase in the weapon's weight, but that wasn't a problem for the last owner. Ammunition: 9mm M72-DD "DumDum" special ammunition can be used.

%c[default]Characteristics:
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Damage = 21, with silencer = 20
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Rate of fire = 172 RPM
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Effective range = 50 meters, with silencer 40
%c[255,238,153,26]Х %c[default]Muzzle velocity = 145 m/s, with silencer 175
%c[default]An ancient PMm received by Degtyarev as a reward for "Successful execution of highly dangerous state orders, as well as valor and courage shown in the line of duty."
